title: Peppo Card Collection
content:
[[iftags -template]]
[[div class="card-box"]]
[[include fragment:peppo-card-base
articleURL=scp-001-ex
| {$orderNew} = -32
| {$orderOld} = 32
| {$orderRate} = -799
| {$orderNum} = 001
| articleLink = scp-001-ex
| articleTitle = SCP-001-EX
| articleImage = http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/peppersghost/001_Ionny_ani_reddit.jpg
| articleName = A Good Boy
| articleQuote = Ethical felines are stored at Site-5. Faces stored separately.
| hideCard = {$SCP} | hideCard = inherit
| articleCredit = Co-Author: The Great Hippo
| creditLink = the-great-hippo
| showCredit1 = inherit
| articleCredit2 = Art by Ionny_ani
| creditLink2 = https://www.reddit.com/user/Ionny_ani/
| showCredit2 = inherit
]]
